title: Korean Stocks’ World-Beating Rally Just a Start, Investors Say
description: South Korean stocks are seeing no shortage of buy calls after leading global markets in 2025, drawing investors with attractive valuations, tech-driven earnings and strong government support.
content: South Korean stocks are seeing no shortage of buy calls after leading global markets in 2025, drawing investors with attractive valuations, tech-driven earnings and strong government support.
